challenge.title: RSA Challenge IV: Low Private Exponent
challenge.author: Subhayan RoyMoulick, Dan Myshkin, Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description: You are asked to audit a system that uses a Low Private Exponent (i.e. the Private Key), to save time decryption/signing. We think it is a bad idea and the Private Exponent can be approximated. Your Goal: Approximate the Private Exponent.
